title: PC February 15 - No to the extradition of Anan Yaeesh!
content:
Of Anan Yaeesh's liberation committee

The January 29, 2024 the Italian authorities arrested in the city of L'Aquila, Anan Yaeesh, following a request for extradition advanced by the Israeli authorities.

Anan Yaeesh, 37, is a Palestinian originally from the city of Tulkarem, in the West Bank; Over the years he has conducted his business politics within the context of the second incephalica; he discounted over 4 years in employment prisons and suffered an ambush of the Israeli special forces in 2006, during which he reported serious wounds for the blows inflicted on him.

Anan He leaves Palestine in 2013, headed for Europe. Goes Initially in Norway where it is subjected to interventions surgical to remove the bullets left in his body for years.

In the 2017 reaches Italy, where it is established, and where in 2019 he obtained a regular residence permit. In 2023 he went to Jordan, where he comes kidnapped by the Giordani security services for the purpose, with each probability, to deliver it to Israel.

After over six months of detention, following the spread of the news of his arrest and the danger that he would be delivered to the authorities Israeli, Giordani's security services are in the condition to have to release it in order to avoid discontent and reactions on the side public opinion.

In the November 2023 returns to Italy, to L'Aquila, where he lives, and comes arrested following an Italian-Israeli capture mandate; this has place following the consent by the Italian government o

Extraway - is in fact on the basis of the minister's indications of Italian justice that is carried out the request for measurement precautionary.

There decision by Italy to proceed with the extradition is to enormous gravity, and the seriousness of the fact that it is taken into consideration The extradition of a Palestinian citizen to the Israeli authorities (on the basis of hypothetical resistance actions, held in the territories employed, therefore protected by international law), are added also a series of considerations dictated by the current situation politics.

In primis Italy would deliver a Palestinian to the Israeli authorities, which would process it in a military court. In addition, in the course Of the last few months, there have been multiple organizations of organizations e International associations for human rights that report the inhumane Conditions of detention and torture in Israeli prisons.

There concern for the current situation is in the certainty that, in the event of extradition, Anan's fate will be to be conducted before a military court and subjected to inhuman treatments, unthinkable prison conditions, conditions that today bring to 9 the number of Palestinian political prisoners killed in the last four months in Israeli prisons, died of torture and negligence health.

Furthermore, In all likelihood, the elements on which they were formalized accusations to Anan Yaeesh are the result of now well -known methods investigation and interrogations considered illegal in Italy e compatible with the definition of torture.

We believe that this episode also risks representing a dangerous previous aimed at clearing the extradition and delivery of Palestinians in Italy and in Europe on the request of Israel which, remember, door a military occupation of the Palestinian territories ahead.
